channel.title: Comments on: New twitter account for MySQL Cluster news
channel.description: Database technologies - especially around scalability and High Availability

item.title: By: admin
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Thanks Luca and Mikael, should be fixed now.
item.content:encoded: Thanks Luca and Mikael, should be fixed now.

item.title: By: Mikael Ronstrom
item.dc:creator: Mikael Ronstrom
item.description: You might want to fix the link, the text seems correct but the link goes to planet.mysql.com.
item.content:encoded:
You might want to fix the link, the text
seems correct but the link goes to
planet.mysql.com.

item.title: By: Luca Olivari
item.dc:creator: Luca Olivari
item.description:
Andrew,
great idea. There is a "bug" in the link. If you click on it, this will bring you to http:/, instead of pointing to your tweets.
Regards, Luca
item.content:encoded:
Andrew,

great idea. There is a “bug” in the link. If you click on it, this will bring you to http:/, instead of pointing to your tweets.

Regards,
Luca
